thread.title: Chanee Rou
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Chanee Rou

author: Chanee Rou
title: Chanee Rou
text: I truly appreciate that clients receive complimentary shipping with the options of upgrading to 2nd day or overnight. My recent online purchase was for bottle of Ambre Nuit and I also received free samples including a miniature of choice. They have options to choose from, and that means a lot to me, as a customer because It makes me feel privileged. I just wish the online shop offered the same miniatures department stores offered (miniature of the privee line) . The gift wrapping was exquisite! The delivery was also on time !
